name: Underwater Rush
description:
An Endless Runner Game promoting how we should not throw garbage because its harmful to animals. Unzip the zip file, go into the folder and open Underwater Rush.

Run the web version in full screen or you will have GUI scaling issues.

Not tested yet on Mac and Linux.

v1.1 - Added pause menu, credits, sounds and more platforms!

v1.2 - Added huge art update, animation and character select!
